name: Out of Pizza
description:
pizza time

Keyb
-AD to steer
-WS to accel and deccel
-RightClick to firstperson
-Space to jump
-P or Esc to pause

Controller
-LStick to steer
-RightTrigger accel, LeftTrigger deccel
-X to firstperson
-A to Jump
-Start to pause
-Dpad in menus

Navigating UI with controller stops if you touch the mouse for some reason, so use that if it's not working
